ComicInfo.Title: A Mother and Daughter Chat; Dinner at Ben's; How I Got Published In a Big Glossy Magazine; People... Ya Gotta Love 'Em!; A Bird in the Beard; Quaker School Q-Ties in Plan Against The Boys; A Scam a Day: Growing Up as Arnie's Girl; Where Am I?; The Gal for Stan; Momster; Heavy Flow; Dolores Park
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-19 15:23:38. [CVDB231257] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:00:54. [Issue ID 46772]

ComicInfo.Summary:
Mrs. Fleener doesn't understand what a clitoris is
Leslie is hit on.
An extreme method of ensuring publication in a major magazine
The struggle through the great mass of humanity.
DJ Don has a crush on Barb.
A group of schoolgirls discover one of their number has reached puberty.
Big Bitch acquires a formula enabling the total recall of dreams.
Arnie's brutal parenting.
A man plagued by a violent hallucination
Stan sets his heights high when detailing a prospective girlfriend.
A family beset by monsters
Out of tampons, Julie goes on the rampage.
A pigeon with a surprise.
